title: Luther - Season 1 - Promo Trailer
author: GotPilot
comment: He’s the black Daniel Craig, which I personally love, like an English Fresh Prince of Bel Air, the coolest man in America in the 90s. Don’t believe me? Watch Good Luck Charlie. He IS the English Will Smith.

I've desperately been searching for the song used as background music in bbc HD Poland version of this trailer (serie"s ad) for two days know. it sounds like Idris Elba's own voice. But I checked all of the songs by Idris Elba and all of the trailers I'm getting mad why I can't find that song anywhere on web? when I can hear it every time in series promotion trailer each week... There is a part saying "....evil..but you don't Know me..." or something like that. Pls Some One save me from getting mad...
